name: Curiosity Stream Inc.
description: Curiosity Stream Inc. is a leading streaming service dedicated to providing premium documentaries and factual programming. Founded in 2015 by John Hendricks, the visionary behind the Discovery Channel, Curiosity Stream aims to inspire curiosity and encourage exploration of the world through high-quality content. The platform offers a vast library of documentary films and series across various categories including science, history, technology, nature, and society. With its user-friendly interface and availability on multiple devices, Curiosity Stream caters to a diverse audience interested in learning and discovery. The company emphasizes educational programming that is both entertaining and informative, making it an excellent resource for lifelong learners and curious minds. As a pioneer in the edutainment space, Curiosity Stream has forged partnerships with renowned filmmakers and experts, ensuring its content remains top-notch and engaging. The streaming service operates on a subscription model, allowing users to access an extensive collection of documentaries for a monthly or annual fee. With a commitment to fostering a love for knowledge and understanding, Curiosity Stream continues to innovate in the digital media landscape, expanding its content offerings and reaching viewers globally.

seo.meta_title: Curiosity Stream Inc. | Premium Documentaries and Factual Programming
seo.meta_description: Explore Curiosity Stream Inc., the leading streaming service for documentaries and factual content. Discover a world of knowledge with Curiosity Stream's extensive library.

faq.question: What is Curiosity Stream?
faq.answer: Curiosity Stream is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of documentaries and factual content.

faq.question: Who founded Curiosity Stream?
faq.answer: Curiosity Stream was founded by John Hendricks in 2015.

faq.question: What types of content does Curiosity Stream provide?
faq.answer: Curiosity Stream provides documentaries across categories such as science, history, nature, and technology.

faq.question: How can I access Curiosity Stream?
faq.answer: You can access Curiosity Stream by subscribing online and streaming on various devices.

faq.question: Where is Curiosity Stream headquartered?
faq.answer: Curiosity Stream is headquartered in Silver Spring, Maryland, USA.
